float gtrack_calcDistance ( GTRACK_measurement_vector *  p1,
GTRACK_measurement_vector *  p2 
)

Description
This function is used to calculate a distance between two points defined in measurement coordinates

Parameters
[in]p1Pointer to measurements (spheriacl form) vector
[in]p2Pointer to measurements (spheriacl form) vector
Return values
distance,m

GTRACK_boundaryBox *  box 
)

Description
This function checks whether the point is inside the box boundary or not

Parameters
[in]cpointer to a position in cartesian space
[in]boxpointer to a 2D box object
Return values
1if inside, 0 otherwise

float gtrack_unrollRadialVelocity ( float  rvMax,
float  rvExp,
float  rvIn 
)

Description
This function is used to unroll radial velocity from +/- rvMax form based on expectation velocity value

Parameters
[in]rvMaxUnambigious radial velocity
[in]rvExpExpected radial velocity value
[in]rvInMeasured radial velocity value
Return values
rvOutUnrolled radial velocity value
